channel.title: Making a noncombat stat gives combat?
channel.description: Ok,well i've been waiting to know how to do this for a while now,i want to make my max level on my server 138,but for this i need to have some stat added,or to make a noncombat stat give combat exp,so for example (theiveing) how would i make theiveing gives the theving levels but also give combat levels?any help will be appericated. :rolleyes:
